sentences: (CNN) Donald Trump’s campaign chairman Paul Manafort has resigned from his position on the campaign, the Republican presidential nominee said in a statement Friday.

Donald Trump’s campaign chairman, Paul Manafort, resigned from his position on Friday morning following a staff shakeup earlier in the week and increasing scrutiny over his ties to Russia and Ukraine.
In a statement Friday morning, Trump said that Manafort offered his resignation.
Manafort’s resignation comes days after Stephen K Bannon took a leave of absence from Breitbart News to serve as Trump’s campaign CEO and Kellyanne Conway was promoted to campaign manager.
” Trump announced this week the hiring of a new CEO, Stephen Bannon from Breitbart News, and campaign manager, Kellyanne Conway, a pollster who was already with the campaign.
On Wednesday, Trump hired Breitbart News executive Stephen K Bannon as his campaign’s CEO and promoted pollster Kellyanne Conway to campaign manager  —   an apparent demotion for Manafort.

“Paul Manafort’s resignation is a clear admission that the disturbing connections between Donald Trump’s team and   elements in Russia and Ukraine are untenable,” said Clinton campaign manager Robby Mook.
